verbose_text: Treatment of cdc2as GFP-xlf1 cultures with the inhibitor (1NM-PP1) caused a significant reduction of the phosphoband of Xlf1 in Phos-tag western blots, which could be further reduced by phosphatase treatment (XREF_FIG E).
evidence: cdc2as GFP-xlf1 cultures with the inhibitor (1NM-PP1) caused a significant reduction of the phosphoband of Xlf1
